official_title: A bill to amend the Truth in Lending Act to require lenders to post current interest rates charged for various categories of loans to consumers.

summary.text: Requires creditors, under the Truth in Lending Act, to post, at each place of business where they extend credit to consumers, a sign which states clearly and conspicuously the current rates of interest being charged for each category of loan.
